# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(FLASH_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(FLASH)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
FLASHPluginInfo.C
FLASHCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
FLASHPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
FLASHMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtFLASHFileFormat.C
avtFLASHOptions.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
FLASHEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtFLASHFileFormat.C
avtFLASHOptions.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${HDF5_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF5_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IFLASHDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IFLASHDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IFLASHDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MFLASHDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MFLASHDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MFLASHDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MFLASHDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EFLASHDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EFLASHDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EFLASHDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EFLASHDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EFLASHDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EFLASHDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EFLASHDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EFLASHDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases FLASH ${INSTALLTARGETS})
